drug.name: BCG vaccine
drug.description: BCG vaccine has been investigated for the treatment of Neoplasms, Bladder Cancer, Neoplasms by Site, Urologic Diseases, and Urologic Neoplasms, among others.

synonyms.synonym: Bacillus calmette-guerin live antigen, unspecified substrain
